fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the knowledge entry.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Category of knowledge (e.g., 'agent_identity', 'compliance_guardrail', 'disclosure_item', 'mandatory_notice'). Optimized for low-latency filtering.

fields.name: category
fields.description: Sub-category within the knowledge type (e.g., 'identity', 'disclosure_framework', 'required_item'). Optimized for low-latency filtering.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Concise title or name of the knowledge point.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The textual content of the knowledge point, for embedding and semantic search.

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.description: Geographical or legal jurisdiction this knowledge applies to.

fields.name: authority
fields.description: Legal authority or basis for the information.

fields.name: related_statute
fields.description: Specific statute or regulation related to the knowledge (e.g., A.R.S. ยง 33-422).
